choices.text:
Below is an instruction that describes a task. Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

### Instruction:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:

Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this email finds you well. As you may have heard, I will be leaving the company at the end of next week.

I want to thank you for all the opportunities and support you have given me during my time with the company. It has been a pleasure working with you and learning from you.

I am sorry that I won't be able to see out the rest of the year, but I am excited about new opportunities and challenges that lie ahead.

Please let me know if there is anything I can do to help with the transition before my last day on [Date].

Thank you again for everything.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
